quest.name: Il Mheg, the Faerie Kingdom
journal: Thancred is trying to think his way out of the present predicament.

From what little he is able to make of the mischievous voices, Thancred believes that the pixies wish to play with you. He reasons that they may therefore allow you to find their village, Lydha Lran─if nowhere else. At his suggestion, the party continues along the path.

You soon arrive at the pixie settlement, but see no sign of its residents. Convinced this means their games have already begun, Thancred suggests that you search for a plant with a furled tip called a looking grass which should allow you to see them. Before you set about your task, you are warned not to respond to any voices that call to you, lest you fall prey to further mischief.
You succeed in finding the looking grass, but not wholly unscathed. You hurry back to Thancred that he might put an end to the pixies' games.

Thancred puts the looking grass to use, and moments later the pixies pop into being all around you. Unfortunately, they prove disinclined to let you continue on your way, and after a moment's discussion declare that you must lend them a helping hand. Heaving a heavy sigh, Thancred suggests splitting up to tend to the pixies' chores.
objectives: Deliver the looking grass to Thancred.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: So...it is faeries?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I was worried about the others back in Lakeland, but maybe I should be worried about us.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: I'm trying my best to remember...but it feels like peering through fog.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: As it stands, we cannot hope to find the way to Urianger. For that, we must convince the pixies to lift the spell.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: From what I could make of the voices, the creatures want to play with us. If that is the case, they should permit us to find their village─Lydha Lran.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Come. I have a sneaking suspicion this path will lead us directly into their midst.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Oh, and I should mention that Minfilia has been informed of our situation. Of the different worlds and our mission. You may consider her an ally.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The sense of disorientation is quite overwhelming. I cannot take a dozen steps without forgetting whence we came.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: There's not a soul in sight, yet I feel eyes all over us...

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Hmm... There was a plant which might help us...if only I could remember what it looked like...

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Well, here we are. Yet the pixies are nowhere to be seen. Knowing them, their games have already begun. In which case...

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Forename─there is a variety of plant native to these parts with a distinctive furled tip.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: "Looking grass“ is its name─so called because it can be used to spy pixies, believe it or not. I'll...explain how I know all of this later, but first, I need you to help me find some.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Oh─if a voice calls to you, under no circumstances should you respond. You will only subject yourself to further mischief.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Remember, the plant has a furled tip. And I cannot stress this enough, but do not respond to any voices you hear.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You search the scrub, but find nothing resembling looking grass. Suddenly, a voice rings out...

dialogue.name: PIXIEVOICEA03306
dialogue.text: (-Adorable Voice-)Hee hee hee... Greetings, mortal! What is your name?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Forename Surname.

dialogue.name: PIXIEVOICEA03306
dialogue.text: (-Adorable Voice-)Forename Surname, Surname Forename! A wonderful name! Pretty like morning dew and funny like caterpillars!

dialogue.name: PIXIEVOICEA03306
dialogue.text: (-Adorable Voice-)I shall slice it and splice it and make it mine! All mine! And when your name is mine, so are you! Hee hee hee...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Your body begins to feel heavy...

dialogue.name: PIXIEVOICEA03306
dialogue.text: (-Adorable Voice-)Oh, you don't have a name? How very, very sad. I could have had sooo much fun with it, hee hee hee...

dialogue.name: PIXIEVOICEB03306
dialogue.text: (-Kindly Voice-)What is it that you seek, child? Perhaps I can help you find it.

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: I'm searching for looking grass.

dialogue.name: PIXIEVOICEB03306
dialogue.text: (-Kindly Voice-)Ah yes, I know the plant. And being the kindly pixie that I am, I shall take you to it.

dialogue.name: PIXIEVOICEB03306
dialogue.text: (-Kindly Voice-)Just close your eyes and focus on my voice. Set your mind adrift, and together we shall go to the ends of the realm.

dialogue.name: PIXIEVOICEB03306
dialogue.text: Hmph, such a rude child, and too clever by half! I shall seek my fun elsewhere!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Searching the scrub, you find what appears to be looking grass. Suddenly, a voice rings out...

dialogue.name: PIXIEVOICEC03306
dialogue.text: (-Playful Voice-)Ooh, a visitor! Where are you from, pray tell?

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: The Crystarium.

dialogue.name: PIXIEVOICEC03306
dialogue.text: (-Playful Voice-)What is that? Where is that? When is that? In your dreams, perhaps?

dialogue.name: PIXIEVOICEC03306
dialogue.text: (-Playful Voice-)Forget all about that place, for Il Mheg is your home now. Today and tomorrow and forevermore...

dialogue.name: PIXIEVOICEC03306
dialogue.text: (-Playful Voice-)Hmmm... Perhaps this one's hard of hearing... AHEM! WHAT BRINGS YOU HERE!?

dialogue.name: Q4
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: I'm here to see Urianger.

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: Leave me alone!

dialogue.name: PIXIEVOICEC03306
dialogue.text: (-Playful Voice-)Ah, so you can hear me! Good, good!

dialogue.name: PIXIEVOICEC03306
dialogue.text: (-Playful Voice-)Come, let's chitter-chatter, jibber-jabber, bibble-babble! Today and tomorrow and forevermore...

dialogue.name: PIXIEVOICEC03306
dialogue.text: (-Playful Voice-)Ach! Stone-deaf! How boring!

dialogue.name: PIXIEVOICEC03306
dialogue.text: (-Playful Voice-)Still...picking plants at our village is as good as indulging in our hospitality. And who are we to turn you away? Hee hee, stay awhile...stay forever!

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: I take it you met with some trouble. Apologies for subjecting you to that.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Can I assume from your presence that you managed to find us some looking grass?

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Yes, this is the stuff. Thus armed, we should be able to see through the pixies' veil of invisibility. And seeing them is the first step to dealing with them.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Come, let's gather everyone and put Urianger's little trick to good use.
